p: Three xanthones; 1,7-dihydroxyxanthone ( 185), macluraxanthone ( 186) and allaxanthone B ( 187) were obtained from Allanblackia floribunda (Guttiferae) by Azebaze et al. [ 78]. The three compounds exhibited antiplasmodial activities against the F 32 and FCM 29 strains with IC 50 values ranging from 0.91 to 70.33 µM for the first strain and from 0.68 to 67.22 µM against the second [ 78].
